name: LTE Uplink Receiver PHY Benchmark

screenshots.caption: Flowchart of the LTE baseband processing.

short_description:
The LTE Uplink Receiver PHY benchmark is a realistic implementation of the baseband processing for an LTE mobile base station. The benchmark implements the processing required by the base station in an uplink.

For more information either download the benchmark and read the included documentation or read the ISPASS 2012 publication "An LTE Uplink Receiver PHY Benchmark and Subframe-Based Power Management" that can be downloaded from http://www.sjalander.com/research/pdf/sjalander-ispass2012.pdf.
